product_name: BIC Sport Ace Tec Cross Adventure Stand Up Paddle Board - 11'
long_description: This user-friendly paddle board has a wide, fully padded deck for outstanding stability and features 10 tie-down points for securing gear, making it ideal for fishing, yoga and all-round pleasure.
short_description: This user-friendly paddle board has a wide, fully padded deck for outstanding stability and features 10 tie-down points for securing gear, making it ideal for fishing, yoga and all-round pleasure.
